thread.title: New Cristiano Ronaldo Statue Doesn’t Look Like Him At All And Twitter Has Jokes
thread.title_full: New Cristiano Ronaldo Statue Doesn’t Look Like Him At All And Twitter Has Jokes

author: Tim McGovern
title: New Cristiano Ronaldo Statue Doesn’t Look Like Him At All And Twitter Has Jokes
text:
Like Us On Facebook 
Cristiano Ronaldo may be a soccer star in human form, but in statue form? 
In statue form, he looks like a mixture of The Joker and Stephen King’s “It” (check out the new trailer for “It” right here, by the by). 
WHY. SO. SERIOUS??! REUTERS 
The new bust is the second such statue of Ronaldo to look all kinds of awful. In case you don’t remember, Cristiano had his likeness immortalized in a statue erected (all puns intended) in his city of birth, Funchal… 
WITH AN ENORMOUS, BULGING PENIS. REUTERS 
The most recent bust was unveiled during a renaming ceremony of Portugal’s Madeira International Airport. 
From now on, the airport will be called Aeroporto Cristiano Ronaldo. 
This is a huge honor, but the real talk of the town is this scary bust, which probably belongs in the Haunted Mansion. YouTube/REUTERS Needless to say, Twitter had a field day making fun of the creepy statue. I don't know what you're talking about guys, I think the Ronaldo statue looks pretty good pic.twitter.com/JIUwQBuqUY
